name: Midnight Maid Night
description:
The Midnight Maids are a small, local cleaning service.

After their 2 o'clock appointment abruptly cancels on them, they suddenly find themselves short of funds.

To make up the difference, they accept a side job moving items out of a client's newly purchased mansion.

However, the job proves to be more difficult than expected when the estate's unresolved history begins to resurface.

This game operates on a checkpoint based save system.
The game will save each time you complete a room!
